nodes.name: onlyBridgeContract

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if sender is not account reserved for the system operations.

@return List of bridge contracts addresses.

attributes.name: onlyBridgeContract

addExtraReceiver(uint256,address).details: Add a receiver for the minted native tokens. Can be called on by a valid bridge contract, that is whitelisted in the contract.

params._amount: amount of native coins to mint for the receiver.
params._receiver: address of a recipient account, to which coins should be minted.

blockRewardContractId().details: Verifies that this contract is indeed a block reward contract, by returning a 4-byte contract identifier.

bridgeAmount(address).details: Shows pending mint amount, requested by a particular bridge address that hasn't been yet processed by the call to reward().

extraReceiverAmount(address).details: Retrieves accumulated amount of requested minted value for the particular receiver address.
extraReceiverAmount(address).return: total amount of requested mint operations in the current block.

extraReceiverByIndex(uint256).details: Retrieves extra receiver address by its index from the extra receivers list.

params._index: index of receiver in the list, should be less than extraReceiversLength().

extraReceiversLength().details: Retrieves a number of registered extra receivers in the pending block.
extraReceiversLength().return: length of the extra receivers list.

mintedForAccount(address).details: Retrieves the total minted amount for the given address for the whole chain lifetime.
mintedForAccount(address).return: total amount of requested mint operations for the given user for all blocks.

mintedForAccountInBlock(address,uint256).details: Retrieves the total minted amount for the given address in the particular block.
mintedForAccountInBlock(address,uint256).return: total amount of requested mint operations for given user in the given block.

mintedInBlock(uint256).details: Retrieves the total minted amount in the given block.
mintedInBlock(uint256).return: total amount of requested mint operations in the specific block.

mintedTotally().details: Retrieves the total minted amount for all users for all blocks.
mintedTotally().return: total amount of requested mint operations in this block reward contract.

mintedTotallyByBridge(address).details: Retrieves the total minted amount for all users for all blocks for the particular bridge.
mintedTotallyByBridge(address).return: total amount of requested mint operations in this block reward contract associated with the given bridge address.

reward(address[],uint16[]).details: Special method that is called by the system, in order to get accounts and values for minting new coins in upcoming block. Can be called only by a system-reserved address.

params.benefactors: list of block reward receivers, should be empty.
params.kind: list of reward types for addresses in benefactors list, should be empty.

reward(address[],uint16[]).return: tuple of addresses list and values list of the same length that describes where and how much new coins should be minted.
